Royal Moroccan Moisturizing Shampoo - Imported (300 ml) Price: Rs.3800

Royal Moroccan Moisturizing Shampoo 10. 5 fl oz (300 ml). For Dry amp Colored HairDeeply Cleanses amp SmoothesLeaves Your Hair Feeling Feather-LightHelps to Repair amp ProtectRoyal Moroccan Moisturizing Shampoo deeply cleanses and smoothes your hair. this special treatment shampoo rich in proteins Argan oil and vitamin E will nourish strengthen add natural shine and leave your hair feeling feather-light. Creates soft stunning perfection. Helps to repair and protect against chemicals and impurities. For professional use only. Not tested on animals.
